q_en: What sewing tasks will Elite Sewers be assigned before June 30, 2024?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Elite Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Elite Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.start_time, st.end_time, op.number, p.attributes, pt.description FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE st.working_group_id = '10' AND st.start_time < '2024-06-30';
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks assigned to the working group "Elite Sewers" before June 30, 2024

response:

Looks like the "Elite Sewers" will be working on a lovely pink skirt in size M. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask! ğŸ˜Š
